body.name: Dishwasher Door Prop Opener (New Model) Keeps Your Dishwasher Door Propped Open
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 18 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 33 mins
features: Please Watch Video: to determine its compatibility with your dishwasher.
If your dishwasher door falls open, this solution may not be suitable for your appliance. It functions as a door prop, facilitating air circulation for interior drying.
Important: This item does not contain magnets and does not attach to the door; instead, it serves to obstruct the door from closing.

View the video for a demonstration of its function: it clips onto the top wire rack, ensuring the door remains open. It doesn't grip the door to keep it open; rather, it prevents the door from closing, particularly in dishwashers equipped with a spring assist for door closure.
Maintains the Dishwasher Door in an Open Position - Requires a door with spring-loaded assistance for closure
Will fit on most dishwasher wire racks – install on the top rack only - Custom design by IQ Labs Dishwasher safe Material - Dimensions: 5.5" Total Extension - 1" Thick – 4” in height.
New Updated Model Improved Smooth Surfaces (No longer 3D printed)
What You Get: 1 Dishwasher Opener (everything else Sold Separately)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product! Perfect for my needs!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use! I have been propping a box in my dishwasher to air it out so that dishes dry completely. This product is PERFECT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works to keep dishwasher door ajar.
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Easy to flip up to run the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works very well, like that I can leave it in dishwasher, if I had to say any thing or offer any improvement, it would be a that it could be a little bit shorter. It leaves the dishwasher open a bit much for my small kitchen, but probably not an issue in larger kitchens that you can avoid that section when in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this thing
reviews.reviewText: This little gadget is so easy to use. You just flip it out to prop the door open, then flip it in for washing or when you want to close the door. It hardly takes any room and is a great way for the dishwasher to air out between cycles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but worth it
reviews.reviewText: My dishwasher stays wet. Even if I set it to "extra dry", it's always wet when I open it. I'm not always on top of unloading the dishwasher when it's finished cleaning.This product solves my problems by propping the door after I clean my dishes. The remaining water evaporates out within hours. I no longer encounter unexpected mold on clean dishes that have sat in the dishwasher for more than a few days.For a piece of plastic, this is a little expensive, but it's heavy duty and well-designed. I would buy it again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Where has this little device been all my life??Its so simple and I probably overpayed, but I have been wanting a dishwasher door prop for so many years its worth it.It works perfectly. So easy to put in and take out. Game changer.I am very happy to have purchased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this product been all of my life?
reviews.reviewText: I used to use a wad of paper towels to keep the dishwasher door open. It looked pretty cheesy and was forever falling on the floor. This product snaps onto the top shelf of the dishwasher and it snaps off just as easily. It keeps the door open exactly the right amount, enough to let air in but not enough to invite things to fall into it. I wish it came with a double fan, one to push air in and the other to draw it out. That would dry the dishes much faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It serves its purpose. It does eliminate the odor that came from the door being completely closed. Not great having the door open but I prefer that to the alternative….. and odor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it Should - Absurdly Expensive
reviews.reviewText: The device works at intended. However, for a piece of plastic, the price is ridiculous. I only bought it because it's better than leaving the door wide open or closed.
